content.prompt:
The tree can be traversed by deciding on a sequence to visit each node. There are three traversal algorithms: in-order traversal, pre-order traversal and post-order traversal.
In-order traversal visits the nodes from the left, the root node and the right
Pre-order traversal visits the nodes from the root node, the left and the right
Post-order traversal visits the nodes from the left, the right and the root node.
In this example, we construct an in-order traversal algorithm.
